game.name: Lights Out
game.rules: A random set of lights is chosen from a rectangular grid of lights. Initially, each light in the random set is switched on and each light not in the random set is switched off.[br]To move, select a light. This will toggle the selected light and all lights orthogonally adjacent to it.[br]The puzzle is solved when all lights in the grid are switched off.[img src="a.svg" alt="a" width="300" height="300"]
